name: What connects them?
description:
What connects them?  is a simple Q&A  game about different connections  between two things.  It's a JAM game, so right now  it has just a few questions to show how everything works.

I started to learn unity and game development around two weeks ago  while  isolated with    COVID19   watching    John's videos, so this JAM was the perfect excuse to push me  and make a "complete" game (I mean, not just play around with sprites and player movements).  Because of this, I focused on learn how to make a complete game (menu, scene transition, animations, scores,  sound, game state, restart the game, etc)   and didn't want to make a "platfomer" and  spend all my time with the visuals, level design, etc.   With a full time job,    two kids and just one week of game development "experience" ... don't be to harsh on me!

PD: I'm not sure if I exported it  the right way for WebGL as I  don't know how to test it.... Just to be sure something works, I also upload the  Mac executable.

Sounds are  free to use from   https://pixabay.com/music/search/game/.
